attributes.action: Lift visa requirements between Ukraine and UK
attributes.additional_details: To save the lives of the Ukrainian family members of UK citizens. UK must play its part in supporting those affected
attributes.background: Implement emergency measure to support the swift exit of both Ukrainian family members of UK citizens and the family of Ukrainian people resident in UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
